description:
29 Pharaoh Drive, Cranbourne
Conveniently located within walking distance to Springhill Shopping Centre and Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre this charming property is just a short drive to all the amenities Cranbourne has to offer, including Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre, Bunnings, Officeworks, supermarkets, shops, train station, etc. Surrounded by main arterials such as Narre Warren-Cranbourne Road, Thompsons Road, and South Gippsland Highway provides easy access to your desired destination.

This beautiful home comprises of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a double garage with a rear roller door for trailer access. The welcoming wide entrance leads to the master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in-robe. An incredible and well designed open plan kitchen overlooks the garden through double sliding doors, ideal for family entertainment and BBQ's in the summer.

Main features include:
- Master bedroom with WIR & ensuite
- 4 Bedrooms
- 2 Living Area
- Alfresco
- Low Maintenance
- Fresh Paint
- Solar Panels
- Rear roller door
- Heating Yes
- Cooling Yes
- Downlights Yes

This neighbourhood offers a family-friendly lifestyle with local parks, schools and shopping precincts. You'll have access to the M1 with Cranbourne Station nearby for stress-free travel. Enjoy weekends away or day trips to the many beaches and national parks all within an easy distance.

This incredible home could be yours! call Sartaj 0426 011 313 to book your inspection.

Disclaimer:
